song_lyric:
In Crescent City I met a girl
Who was as pretty as the light of day
She was so pretty
She would take your breath away
In Crescent City I met a girl
Who was as pretty as the rose in May
But when I tried to say I love you
I could find no words to say

多少期待 多少梦想
遗留在那条路上
多少回忆 多少时光
只剩一个人珍藏
有几首歌 没人听过
却会渐渐被遗忘
是谁决定 谁的故事
值得被别人欣赏

In Crescent City I left a girl
Who was more pretty than I care to say
Although she was so pretty
I could not stay

In Crescent City I left a girl
Who was more pretty than I care to say
Although she was so pretty
I could not stay
I could not stay
I could not stay
I could not stay
